answerText: The Tale of Genji [or Genji Monogatari] [10] This Chinese classic starts with the release of 108 heavenly spirits, and follows the trials and tribulations of these 108 outlaws in the Song Dynasty.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Carnegie Mellon University and University of Central Florida | 18 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these novels from East Asia, for 10 points each.   [10] This 11th-century work by Lady Murasaki has been widely considered to be the world's first novel; it tells the story of the titular prince at Japanese court during the Heian period.
